Hello, this is my first post here. I own Avantis since June this year and find it as a great mixer. However i noticed that in live situation, when i need to fast change parameters, sometimes GUI is laggy and delayed. I know there are many things going in that box.

My firmware is 1.21.

Are you experiencing same behavior? Or is it something on my side?

It depends on what you mean.

Thereâ€™s normal laggy: like swapping between the banks for the first time after recalling a session. After youâ€™ve gone through all of the banks/layers, youâ€™ll see the gui updates quicker when you go to those banks again.

Thereâ€™s abnormal laggy: Iâ€™ve had crazy stuff happening. Like multiple second of delay, members of mute groups changing very slowly before my eyes (probably because it took several seconds to catch up to the mute group I had navigated to).

In my case this was probably due to a hardware issue which should be repaired now.

I havenâ€™t got enough hours of stress test on it since the repair to know if it succeeded.

In short, she GUI normally is not always as snappy as Iâ€™d like, but itâ€™s usually doable. It can manage to just about keep up with me.

When itâ€™s not doable, and really slowing you down, somethingâ€™s either wrong with the desk, or itâ€™s fine but simply the wrong desk for you.

Both options are possible, but if the GUI is really laggy at times, you might have a hardware issue causing that.
